Articles.Content: After seeing the Duna sstv signal being decoded, I wanted to make my own out of my own pics.Does anyone know of a good software to CREATE your own SSTV Signal?
I've wanted to do this too. 'Tis a shame that I myself don't know of any, especially those which work on Mac.
I can't name a program as such, but have a search for free radio ham software and you'll probably find several different programs . The amateur radio guys are quite big on SSTV.
